name: Lovely Guns
description:
Lovely Guns is my first game made with Unity (I'm more of a Game Maker person y'know). So it's veeeery simple, you have to shoot your lovely opponent before she/he does!

The controls are randomly generated at each game so fight for the keyboard! (It's based on the same mechanic than Fortune Catcher, a game I've made with Yowan Langlais: http://muyo.itch.io/fortune-catcher)

Have fun!

@mayhow
